system.requirements:
Tau Pathfinder Alternative Advance, 600xp
Agility 45, Hard Target
system.effect: Whenever Character succeeds on a Dodge or Parry Test to avoid an attack made from an enemy within 20m, their allies gain +20 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests made against that foe until the beginning of the character's next turn.
